attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I WOULD LIKE TONY BLAIR TO FORCE EMPLOYERS TO EMPLOY 25% OF THEIR WORK FORCE WHO HAVE MENTAL HEALTH PROBLEMS

rejection.details: Please resubmit without BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult for people to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
